description: Ms. component part. Title from leaf 186b, lines 2-3. Physical description: 17 lines per page; written in small naskh with elements of nastaʻliq in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Extensive staining and a few paper repairs. Incipit: الحمد لله ... انى قد صنفت هذا الکتاب و جمعت فىه بىن الحکم و نظىره وسمىته نزهة الناظر
author: Ḥillī, Yaḥyá ibn Saʻīd, 1204 or 1205-1291
abstract: Treatise on Shiʻite law in 79 unnumbered bāb; incomplete at end.
extent: leaves 186b-223b : paper ; 187 x 121 (134 x 79) mm bound to 191 x 131 mm
title: Nuzhat al-nāẓir fī al-jamʻ bayna al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir.
creator: حلي، يحيى بن سعيد، 1204 or 1205-1291
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
